description:
Locals have branded a Clean Air Neighbourhood a "cynical greenwashing scheme" after the Labour-run London council amassed nearly £12 million in fines from motorists.

The post Motorists Stung With £12 Million of Fines From Clean Air Neighbourhood appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Motorists Stung With £12 Million of Fines From Clean Air Neighbourhood

description:
OpenAI has unveiled revolutionary voice cloning technology capable of mimicking voices within seconds, but is withholding its release amid fears of misuse during an election year.

The post OpenAI’s Creepy Voice-Cloning Tool Which Can Replicate Anyone’s Voice Within Just 15 Seconds Is Deemed ‘Too Risky’ for Public Use appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: OpenAI’s Creepy Voice-Cloning Tool Which Can Replicate Anyone’s Voice Within Just 15 Seconds Is Deemed ‘Too Risky’ for Public Use

description:
JK Rowling has vented her anger online over Scotland's new hate crime law, warning it will muzzle free speech and criminalise something as simple as using the wrong pronouns.

The post ‘Arrest Me!’: J.K. Rowling Challenges Scotland’s New Hate Crime Laws appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: ‘Arrest Me!’: J.K. Rowling Challenges Scotland’s New Hate Crime Laws

description:
A transgender support group, likening women's rights activists to the Ku Klux Klan, has been granted tens of thousands of pounds of taxpayers’ money to provide training to government departments.

The post Support Group for Transgender Civil Servants That Likened Women’s Rights Campaigners to the Ku Klux Klan Is Handed £190,000 of Taxpayers’ Money appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Support Group for Transgender Civil Servants That Likened Women’s Rights Campaigners to the Ku Klux Klan Is Handed £190,000 of Taxpayers’ Money

description:
In a legal battle over discrimination and free speech rights, a devout Christian social worker is suing an NHS-backed firm after his £25,000 job offer was rescinded due to his views on homosexuality.

The post Christian Worker Suing NHS-Backed Care Firm Which Rescinded Job Offer appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Christian Worker Suing NHS-Backed Care Firm Which Rescinded Job Offer

description:
Shop owners are seething after a £1.2 million cycle lane in Castleton, Greater Manchester, triggers a 50% drop in local trade.

The post Fury After New £1.2 Million Cycle Lane ‘Kills’ Suburb by ‘Crippling Trade’ appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Fury After New £1.2 Million Cycle Lane ‘Kills’ Suburb by ‘Crippling Trade’

description:
Cambridge University is seeking to 'decolonise the dodo' by hiring a PhD student to delve into the imperial connections of specimens, highlight racial ideas, violent colonial activities and resource exploitation.

The post Cambridge to ‘Decolonise the Dodo’ in Taxpayer-Backed Project appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Cambridge to ‘Decolonise the Dodo’ in Taxpayer-Backed Project
